firmName: Sette Câmara, Corrêa e Bastos Advogados Associados
description: Sette Câmara, Corrêa e Bastos Advogados Associados is a full-service law firm that provides expert legal advice and services to its clients. The firm has a prominent position among the country's biggest law firms due to its excellence in providing legal services, covering the entire spectrum of practice areas. With over 3 decades of experience, the firm has a team of experienced lawyers and a staff of administrative professionals.

managingPartners.title: Sócio
managingPartners.biography: Sérgio Santos Sette Câmara is a partner at Sette Câmara Corrêa e Bastos, specializing in commercial and corporate law.

managingPartners.title: Sócio
managingPartners.biography: Roberta Espinha Corrêa is a partner at Sette Câmara Corrêa e Bastos, specializing in tax law.

managingPartners.title: Sócio
managingPartners.biography: Luiz Flávio Valle Bastos is a partner at Sette Câmara Corrêa e Bastos, specializing in labor law.

managingPartners.title: Sócio
managingPartners.biography: Felipe Gazola Vieira Marques is a partner at Sette Câmara Corrêa e Bastos, specializing in corporate law.
